title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 4, pt. 163 - Estimated Personal Income Tax Due Upon The Sale Or Transfer Of Real Property By A Nonresident Taxpayer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 4, pt. 163 - Estimated Personal Income Tax Due Upon The Sale Or Transfer Of Real Property By A Nonresident Taxpayer

State Regulations
§ 163.1 - General and definitions
§ 163.2 - Estimation of tax due
§ 163.3 - Filing and payment
§ 163.4 - Exemption from requirements
§ 163.5 - Requirements for recording of deed
§ 163.6 - Designation of and duties of agents
§ 163.7 - Liability of recording officer
§ 163.8 - Validity of record of deed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 4, pt. 163

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, 663, 697

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
